text: hello community, I am testing the site search functionality and on IE and is not working. I have found this console error  ` 'URLSearchParams' is undefined ` is something that I am doing wrong? How do I define that parameter?
<@U7VHQMEV7> can you DM me a link to the page?
It looks like a polyfill we use for IE isn’t loading, we’re working on a fix for this and I’ll let you know when it’s been rolled out

Hey all, working on trying to exclude specific pages from the results page. We have 3 different “languages” to the site and it is working for one version and not the other 2. I will attach the code but would love any help I could get. Thanks!

So here you can see that we are printing just uk pages for the first if statement, just au pages for the second and the rest for the third. But also in the third we are excluding the site map page. I have attempted to place that same line in the top 2 if statements but it is actually adding that specific page in.
